tossup_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  Plate tectonics is driven by which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Convection under the Earth’s surface
X) Conduction under the Earth’s surface
Y) Radiation under the Earth’s surface
Z) Advection under the Earth’s surface
tossup_answer: ANSWER: W) Convection under the Earth’s surface
bonus_question: 5) EARTH AND SPACE  What type of rock is sandstone?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Igneous
X) Sedimentary
Y) Metamorphic
Z) Mineral
